body.title: Comments
body.elms:
```applescript
-- This is a single line comment
```

```applescript
# This is another single line comment
```

```applescript
(*
This is
a multi
line comment
*)
```

body.title: Say
body.elms:
```applescript
-- default voice
say "Hi I am a Mac"
```

```applescript
-- specified voice
say "Hi I am a Mac" using "Zarvox"
```

body.title: Beep
body.elms:
```applescript
-- beep once
beep
```

```applescript
-- beep 10 times
beep 10
```
